Article.ArticleTitle: A Systematic Review of the High-flow Nasal Cannula for Adult Patients.

Abstract.AbstractText: This article is one of ten reviews selected from the Annual Update in Intensive Care and Emergency Medicine 2018. Other selected articles can be found online at https://www.biomedcentral.com/collections/annualupdate2018 . Further information about the Annual Update in Intensive Care and Emergency Medicine is available from http://www.springer.com/series/8901 .

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: The Intensive Care Unit, Shaare Zedek Medical Centre, Jerusalem, Israel.
